author: brekke
msg: No need to delete the test report directory since we want it to be around for doc processing.  The maven:clean target

author: kaz
msg: More documentation changes to more accurately describe whats going on.

author: kaz
msg: - Added a note about the junit report that is generated.
- Previously, Maven "generated" the build files for users.  This is not
entirely true anymore, the build system is "installed" now.  Changed
the terminology used on the page to reflect this new paradigm.

author: kaz
msg: - Added a new public method to DVSLPathTool that accepts a filename (the
other method accepts both a base directory and filename).
- Updated the unit tests to test this method as well.
